overview: A collection of psychic videos, includes "Suicide who passed by" ... This is a video taken when I visited a super famous haunted spot with a friend. The bridge, which was built at a tremendous height, has a lot of suicides, and there is a dam nearby, and it is said that it is also a place where precious lives were lost during construction. And at this time, the photographers encounter a mysterious event on the bridge.
tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 22
